mapper.select: select (select count(*) from md_api where is_deleted = 0) as apiCount, (select count(*) from md_api where is_deleted = 0 and op_type = ${@org.springblade.common.constant.MdConstant@DATA_PRODUCER}) as producerCount, (select count(*) from md_api where is_deleted = 0 and op_type = ${@org.springblade.common.constant.MdConstant@DATA_CONSUMER}) as consumerCount
